response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $15,000, but considering its potential worth to you, we aim to make it accessible. We propose to offer this remarkable product to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents an outstanding opportunity for both parties, ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a competitive rate. We believe this is a fair and advantageous deal that respects the product's true value while offering you an excellent return on investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
